channel.title: Workshops on RMC Robo Club
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on RMC Robo Club

item.title: 3D Printing
item.description: Captain Marasco will walk everybody through a simple example of CAD and at the end files will be submitted to be actually printed! When? 19:00 on Janurary 28th and 29th Where? Massey 7 perhaps? What will I need? Your own laptop with OpenSCAD installed on it and an idea for what kind of shape you’d like to make. Although our tutorial will be based around OpenSCAD, if you are already comfortable with SolidWorks you may go ahead and use that instead!
